text: Hasan Al-Basri (; full name: Al-Hasan ibn Abi-l-Hasan al-Basri), (642â€“728), was a well-known Sunni Muslim Sufi, preacher and scholar. Hasan was one of the most famous and prominent of the early Sufi saints in Islam. He was a very popular and beloved personality of Basra, in Iraq. ==References== Category:642 births Category:728 deaths Category:Asian Sufis Category:Iraqi Muslims Category:People from Medina
title: Hasan Basri
